name: GaffaPrintable
description: Print gaffa.dk music news stories much more compactly and cleanly than the site default.  Exclude all images.  Print the right column below the main story.

user.name: dknyt
user.about: Danish Firefox user on Fedora Linux

additional_info:
* 20160829 r4.0.1:
- Minor fix needed by some articles to exploit full page width

* 20160427 r4.0.0:
- Rewritten for completely new web design.  For now exclude comments.

* 20160310 r3.1.0:
- Remove unrelated news from 8Bit Engage (added by Gaffa since 3.0.0)

* 20150720 r3.0.0:
- Remove related news stories from Sprinkle (added by Gaffa since 2.1.0)
- Remove a little bit of space between top date and main article

* 20141112 r2.1.0:
- Web design for top banner reverted, so now support both ways
- Remove bottom margins, partly coming from latest web design

* 20141022 r2.0.0:
- Adapted to slightly changed web design (top banner, left ad)
- Align top of left column with right column in 2-column view
- Print comments a bit more compactly, extending to right margin

* 20140927 r1.0.0: First public release
